/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their facades bathed in the warm glow of the sun. Power lines crisscross above, adding a touch of urbanity to the scene. In the distance, a radio tower stands tall, punctuating the cityscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings. The image beautifully encapsulates the blend of history and modernity that characterizes Beijing.
